name: Docker Workshop
description:
Outline :

Containers are not a new thing, but implementing them was always a little more complicated than it needed to be. Docker made great leaps in simplification of containers and set the world on fire from there.

What is Docker ?

Docker is a software container platform. Developers use Docker to eliminate problems when collaborating on code with co-workers. Operators use Docker to run and manage apps side-by-side in isolated containers to get better compute density. Enterprises use Docker to build agile software delivery pipelines to ship new features faster, more securely and with confidence for both Linux and Windows Server apps.

What is covered in the workshop ?

Day 1 - Part 1: Introduction to Docker
Day 1 - Part 2: Up & running with Docker
Day 2: Play with docker
Day 3: Docker in the real lifeÂ 

Â 
Speaker :
Mohammed Zaghloul

GrowArc Founder | Senior Web Developer | Team Lead

Mohammed Zaghloul is a senior front-end developer at OpenCoast, a Spanish based startup. It's main product is Bloowatch, a Booking and Management platform that help surf and watersports schools to managing the activities and administrative tasks. Previously, Mohammed worked as lead front-end developer at Softcrop Media and team leader at Global Impact.

Mohammed is a web developer with more than 9 years of experience working with JavaScript and C# programing languages in JetBrains WebStorm and Microsoft Visual Studio IDEâ€™s on macOS, Linux and Windows Operating Systems. He has a strong background in JavaScript, HTML and CSS, and love MVC design pattern and object oriented programing. He has been developing web application in the last six years using Ember.js & AngularJS JavaScript MVC frameworks beside MicrosoftAsp.NetÂ MVC & more. He also has background in developing T-SQL queries and Microsoft SQL database design. Beside his technical background, He had the chance to lead front-end teams in an Agile environment.

GrowArc is a new firm with a dedicated JavaScript development team, focused on full project service for building high quality web applications in short time.

Mohammed try to keep up to date with new technologies and exploring them and currently he is interested in Docker, Ember, Typescript, Angular, Node, React, Vue, Python, Django, MEAN Stack, C#, .Net Core, Machine Learning

name: ASP.Net MVC Workshop
description:
Do you want to learn how to program and build websites using the latest technologies?

ASP.NET MVC is an open-source web development framework combines the features of MVC (Model-View-Controller) architecture.

What will you learn?
-Learn what MVC is and how to use it.
-Create cleaner code that is easier to manage and reuse.
-Write code with fewer bugs.

Outline :
-Evolution of the web from static page to mvc web application.
-MVC Architecture.
-Routing.
-Controller, action method, action selector, and action verbs.
-Model & data annotation.
-View, partial view, layout.
-Razor syntax.
-Server side validation, client side validation.
-Transfer data using object, viewbag, viewdata and tempdata.
-Action filters.
-Web API.

Instructor:Â 
Nader KhaledÂ 
Web Developer | GDG Alexandria Organizer

Nader Khaled is a web developer with 3-year experience using .Net Framework, C#,Â ASP.NetÂ MVC, Restful Web API, SqlServer, Entity Framework, Visual Studio and Google APIs. He has experience working with client side applications such as Angular, Polymer, and Progressive web apps.
He is an organizer at GDG Alexandria and contributed in the planning and the execution of large scale events such as DevFest and Google I/O Extended, where he shares his technical skills in a form of technical talks, workshops, and codelabs.
He is passionate to learn new technologies and aspiration to share what he learns with others

name: Odoo Open ERP
description:
Do you want to be Odoo developer or Odoo implementor?

What is Odoo / OpenERP?
Odoo / OpenERP is a comprehensive suite of business applications including Sales, CRM, Project management, Warehouse management, Manufacturing, Financial Management, and Human Resources just to name a few. Odoo / OpenERP offers a choice of over a thousand modules.

Speaker:Â 
Eng.Mahmoud SolimanÂ 
Mussder Co-Founder | Senior Odoo Functional Consultant

Mahmoud Soliman is a Mussder Co. co-founder and Senior Odoo Functional Consultant who works with Companies to help them to organize their working processes and to automate their business activities.
He believes that ERP is very essential for all companies.
He has worked with many companies in different countries in different industries.
He is a hard worker and aims to help others to get better chances in their work.Â 
He holds a BSc. of Commerce in Management Information Systems Department from Alexandria University.

Admission fees: only 10 egp

name: Firebase
description:
Firebase is the fastest way to build your app and test your market with MVP. Come and learn how you can build applications quickly without managing complex infrastructure.

Agenda :
Why Choose Firebase?
MBaaS (RealtimeÂ database, Authentication, hosting, storage, Etc)
Cloud messaging
Cloud functionsÂ 
Remote config
App Quality Services (Test Lab - Crash Reporting)
Acquisition (Dynamic Links, Invites, Adwords)
Re-Engagement (Notification - App indexing)
Analytics

Tarek Dahab is a head of research and development at Ibtikar technologies, he has more than 6 years of experience in software industry, He has a big enthusiasm to be a pioneer in incorporating process Improvement into all business and software operations.

name: Google Mobile Site Certification Study jam
description:
â€¢ What we'll do
How to signup !
1- You must have RSVP on Meetup event
2- You must fill the following form : https://goo.gl/forms/QAu5kW7EDFkr1sSt2

**There will be a filtration process and confirmation will be by 10/2/2018

What is a Study Jam?
- Study Jams are community-run study groups for developers covering a range of Google Developers content.

Google Mobile Sites Certification course description
- A professional accreditation that Google offers to individuals who demonstrate understanding in basic and advanced aspects of mobile website design and development.

Outline :-
- Mobile sites and why they matter
- Basics of mobile sites
- User expectations
- Impact on conversions and interaction
- Why UX matters
- Improving mobile site speed
- Tools to get started
- Understanding low bandwidth and high latency
- Targets to focus on
- Critical rendering path
- The render tree
- HTTP Caching

How to signup !
1- You must have RSVP on Meetup event
2- You must fill the following form : https://goo.gl/forms/QAu5kW7EDFkr1sSt2

**There will be a filtration process and confirmation will be by 10/2/2018

â€¢ What to bring
Laptops

â€¢ Important to know

name: Google Cloud Study Jam
description:
How to signup !
1- You must have RSVP on Meetup event
2- You must fill the following form : https://goo.gl/forms/TqFABkrE3qLGBh3f1

**There will be a filtration process and confirmation will be sent before the date

â€¢ What we'll do
What is a Study Jam?
- Study Jams are community-run study groups for developers covering a range of Google Developers content.

Google Cloud Study Jam description
- Learn the fundamentals of the Google Cloud Platform, how to run containers on it and how to use the platform for data engineering.

Outline :-
- Learn how to set up development and production environments in the Cloud.
- Creating a Virtual Machine
- Getting started with Cloud Shell & gcloud
- Provision services with Cloud Launcher
- Learn how Docker and Kubernetes work, or learn how to process Big Data in the Cloud.
- Get access to Qwiklabs, a Google training tool, free of charge (a $70+ value).
- Get Google-hosted badges like this for your online profile, to show potential employers what you know about Cloud computing.

How to signup !
1- You must have RSVP on Meetup event
2- You must fill the following form : https://goo.gl/forms/TqFABkrE3qLGBh3f1

**There will be a filtration process and confirmation will be sent before the date

â€¢ What to bring
Laptop

â€¢ Important to know

name: Kotlin Workshop
description:
We are pleased to announce our first Kotlin Workshop

If you are Android developer or want to develop apps with Kotlin this workshop will be perfect for you

How to signup !
1- You must have RSVP on Meetup event
2- You must fill the following form : https://goo.gl/forms/dxAYDYHV2UxiZpCw1

Agenda
======

3:00 PM - 3:30 PM: Registration
3:30 PM - 4:45 PM: Kotlin workshop:
Using Intellij we will cover:
- Kotlin syntax (you need to be familiar with some other programming language like Java)
- Using filters
- Kotlin treats (why kotlin is so great)
4:45 PM - 5:00 PM: Break
5:00 PM - 6:45 PM: Android using Kotlin
Using Android Studio we will build a full Android Application using kotlin, we will cover:
- Kotlin in Android (why it's better than Java)
- Using the Architecture Components library (ViewModel with retrofit)
- Connect our application to the internet and download Mars Rover's photo of the day
- By the end of this workshop we will have built this (https://github.com/assersamak/MarsRoverPhotos) from scratch
6:45 PM - 7:00 PM: Questions & wrap up

How to signup !
1- You must have RSVP on Meetup event : https://goo.gl/gi6Evu
2- You must fill the following form : https://goo.gl/forms/dxAYDYHV2UxiZpCw1

Venue : Knowledge Stage | location on Google maps : https://goo.gl/maps/rRrxr42Z4ew

Admission fee: 10 EGP

name: International women day 2018
description:
"There are amazingly wonderful people in all walks of life; some familiar to us and others not. Stretch yourself and really get to know people. People are in many ways one of our greatest treasures."
Bryant H. McGill

International women day is a moment to celebrate women's contribution in Tech industry and society in general :)
Our theme for this year is "Building a New Horizon" , There will be amazing people sharing their inspiring stories and a side training to rock your public speaking skills.

#WTM18 #WomenTechmakers #WTMAlexandria #IWD2018

Everyone is welcomed to join!

name: Quality Assurance Mentorship Day

venue.name: Innuva
venue.address_1: 1 Mostafa Kamel Street Roshdy beside Boutique London

description:
https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1-h1Ye0Gu7Q6EDaVfZnyWrs5jdhZ1HcsHj6y3FcPDga0

GDG Alexandria and Innuva IT solution are inviting you to the upcoming event, â€œQuality Assurance mentorship dayâ€. This event will open doors to all fresh â€œQuality Assurance engineersâ€ and help in setting a foot in the doorway of the IT industry. Such a step will be taken with confidence and ease into such a wonderful career path should the first step start here and now. This is your chance towards a promising future.

Quality Assurance Mentorship Day is a journey that will start with:

1st: An introduction about Innuva and what it is all about:
Such an introduction will highlight Innuva in the field of Quality and its methodologies.

2nd: A presentation about the set of important skills necessary for quality assurance:
First of all, when it comes to quality assurance, obvious and direct analysis is a must. Second of all, communication and business marketing skills ought to come hand in hand with having a sharp pair of eyes for details and having the ability to deliver issues in a good way. Last but not least, having substantial knowledge on quality will help make this journey a smooth one; it will definitely add quite an edge. Lastly, being fearless in the face of challenges is not the same as having the ability to work under pressure. Innuva Quality Assurance strives mainly for their engineers to have fun when face to face with stronger challenges than they have ever faced before and to have the desire to stoke that fearless spirit with enthusiasm and confidence.

3rd: A talk about experience-related skills:
Skills picked up in the field are definitely more valuable and priceless than any other skill learned academically. This is simply because they are skills that will set you for life; they cannot be replaced. On this part of your journey, you will learn how to think as a tester and think about the most common mistakes in the field. The target here is mainly the attaining of a special set of â€˜â€™experience skillsâ€™â€™ that will help you everywhere you go in your chosen career path.
4th: Break Time!
We will have fun moments together during our lunch break by enjoying our fun area activities such as â€œplaying with XBOXâ€

5th: One-on-one mentorship
Innuvaâ€™s experienced team leaders will divide the attendees into groups for a session of mentorship and brainstorming ideas. This is to address your individual qualities, offer guidance for those who have difficulties in the field and offer advice about the best career path suitable for you.

Finally, you are most welcomed to start your journey now!
The 1st step in our hiring process is by filling out an application and having a technical exam.

Please Register in this form as there is a limited number of seats available:

https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1-h1Ye0Gu7Q6EDaVfZnyWrs5jdhZ1HcsHj6y3FcPDga0

Note: you have to get an invitation mail to be able to attend the event.
Hope to see you soon.

===========
Google Developer Group Alexandria â€œGDG Alexandriaâ€ is excited to announce Google I/O Extended for the seventh time in a row.

Google I/O is an annual event hosted by Google to highlight the latest in technology and product innovation. This covers unexpected and Exciting topics.

Google I/O Extended events are focused on bringing the local developers community together to experience the keynote and other main Google I/O sessions, in real-time.
They also offer other unique activities targeted to developers, such as hackathons and codelabs.

name: Build Actions for your Community
description:
Build Actions for your Community
#Assistant #BuildYourActions #buildactions

â€¢ What we'll do
â€œBuild Actions for Your Communityâ€ is an open and modular event series designed by Google and offered to community organizers worldwide. This offer opportunities to developers attending this event to learn how to build Actions for the Google Assistant that are useful for their community - whether it's a professional network or interest group. This way, they can build something in an area that they care about or are interested in.

name: NASA Space Apps Alexandria'18
description:
NASA Space Apps is back in Alexandria for its 2nd year!

We are glad to announce that we will partner with NASA Space Apps Alexandria for this year's NASA Space Apps Challenges.

More than 25,000 Participants from 200 different locations located in more than 70 countries are gathering together across the globe on the 19th-21st of October, 2018.

NASA Space Apps is an international hackathon that occurs over 48 hours in cities around the world. Coders, scientists, designers, storytellers, makers, builders, technologists, and everyone enthusiastic about curiosity come together to address challenges we face on Earth and in space!

Now, we invite you to be a part of this exciting, collaborative scientific exploration, as we pair NASAâ€™s data with problem solvers across the globe.

GDG Alexandria offers:
1) Mentors in the fields of Web Development, Mobile Development, and Virtual Reality
2) A package of prizes for our Local Winners

name: Flutter Study Jam
description:
**Reserve your seat now, registration link: https://goo.gl/forms/SrUeioUDU1Nqxxg53

Flutter Study Jams are Community-run study groups based on the Flutter Udacity Course. Participants learn how to use Flutter to develop high-quality, interactive mobile applications for iOS and Android devices.

- Why?
Study Jams are a great opportunity to bring members of your community together to learn Flutter in person and support them to complete the course. Everyone, who completes the course will get a Google-offered Study Jam completion certificate and a profile badge.

- WHO?
Flutter Study Jam is suited best for:
1) those just getting started with mobile app development
2) those with programming experience on other mobile app frameworks.

â€¢ Agenda
=======
09:00 AM to 10:00 AM: Registration
10:00 AM to 10:15 AM: Welcome to DevFest 2018

name: TEDxSmouha - Repatterning

venue.name: Bibliotheca Alexandrina
venue.address_1: Al Azaritah WA Ash Shatebi, Qesm Bab Sharqi, Alexandria Governorate 21526

description:
Wake up, eat, work/study, go back home and sleep. Call it a routine or a cycle or more precisely a â€œPatternâ€ that keeps going on and on and on just draining the life out of us. But this year our goal is the entire opposite of that. We welcome you all to this yearâ€™s event, â€œRe-pattern-ingâ€.

Every little thing in our world is in essence a pattern and throughout the ages different patterns have always collided and intertwined creating & giving us all that was new and revolutionary. Hence, our theme has emerged â€œRe-pattern-ingâ€ with the â€œingâ€ standing for infinity, from the evolution of man and technology & the extinction of many species all the way down to fashion trends, puzzles and Legos.

Time has always had the upper hand, making sure that no matter how long a certain pattern survived, the end stays the same for all. But it remains our choice to not let the core disappear, through tweaking, tailoring and turning the old around, originality is realized.

Registration form: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1Ph2U5iijeTYPRQsNPGwQMRYab_F7V1rCpcNHhl2NCAM/edit?usp=sharing

Call for participation

It is our pleasure to invite you to participate in our Eighth Annual Conference (ICT in our Lives-2018- ISSN:[masked]) under the theme â€œHumanitarian ICTâ€.

The conference is held under the auspices of

His Excellency Professor/ Essam Elkordi - President of Alexandria University

The conference call for papers and all details are available through
ictinourlives.alexu.edu.eg
Information Systems and Computers Department launched this conference series in 2011 under the name "ICT in our lives". Coverage of our previous conferences is accessible through
http://www.facebook.com/ICTinOurLives.
This year the conference is taking place from the 15th to 17th of December 2018. We cordially invite you to participate in this yearâ€™s conference.
Your participation is necessarily an added value to the conference. We also appreciate that you disseminate the news of this event in your network of academic and professional contacts.

Submissions are possible in (but limited to) the following tracks:
1. Algorithms and Applications
2. Big Data in a Connected World
3. Business Intelligence
4. Cloud Computing Security Issues
5. Collaborative Web-Based Working Environments
6. Connected Health
7. Data Base Systems
8. Decision Support Systems
9. E-Government Solutions
10. E-Learning Solutions
11. ICT-Based Creativity and Innovation
12. Internet of Things
13. Geographic Information Systems
14. Knowledge Acquisition, Representation and Management
15. Multi-Agent Systems
16. Multi-Criteria Decision Making
17. Open-Source Software and Legacy Software
18. Pervasive and Adaptive Systems
19. Social Networks Analytics
20. Software Engineering
21. Solutions and Architectures
22. Systems Engineering
23. Systems Modeling
24. Ubiquitous Computing
25. Web Tools and Technologies

Sponsorship call is still open for companies and institutions willing to join as sponsors. Please email us on [masked] for details.

Kindly confirm your attendance through email; please do not hesitate to contact us for any inquiries.

Registration can be done by bank deposit. Banking details will be communicated through the conference website. Do not forget to email us a scan of the receipt.

Looking forward to welcoming you all in Alexandria.

name: DevRel MENA Study Jams & TOT [ Alexandria ]

venue.name: Information Technology Institute
venue.address_1: 1 Mahmoud Salamah, Kom Ad Dakah Gharb

description:
Dev Ecosystem Study Jams
Study Jams are study groups complementary to Google Developers Roadshow MENA events, ran by Dev Ecosystem MENA with content from Google Developers.

The objective of the Study Jams is to increase the technical competence of the members of our community through face-to-face courses.

These trainings give the members of our community a series of skills that can be used for personal and professional development.

Join us in the second edition of Study Jams MENA!

Study Jam
Training Of Trainers
TOT is important, because any trainer needs two separate sets of skills and knowledge; The topic they are teaching (subject matter expertise); And the know-how of transferring that information to the student (instructional expertise). Instructors need both of these sets of skills, and we train you on both.

The goal of the Training of Trainers (TOT) process is to give new trainers the background knowledge, skills and practical experience to provide communities the training and technical assistance they need.

These trainings ensures that communities have their qualified local trainers, who can conduct these workshops in a scalable & self-sustainable way.

You can enroll now with commitment & dedication!

https://events.withgoogle.com/study-jams-tot

name: Assistant for Women & I Am Remarkable

venue.name: icealex innovation hub
venue.address_1: Omar Lotfy, Al Azaritah WA Ash Shatebi

description:
#WTM #GDG #IAmRemarkable #Assistnat

Women Techmakers Alexandria invites you to attend Assistant for Women & I Am Remarkable event.
The event will be sponsored by icealexandria Innovation hub, I*Lead Initiative for Women leadership. I* Lead initiative goal is to further supporting and strengthening female entrepreneurs and female leaders during their professional life and development.

What will be the event about?
Google Assistant, Build Actions for Your Community, is an open and modular event series designed by Google and offered to community organizers worldwide. This offer opportunities to developers attending this event to learn how to build Actions for the Google Assistant that are useful for their community - whether it's a professional network or interest group. This way, they can build something in an area that they care about or are interested in.

#IamRemarkable strives to empower women and underrepresented groups to speak openly about their accomplishments in the workplace and beyond, thereby breaking modesty norms and glass ceilings.

Event Registration Form: "Required" https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1COB06ORZan1X9UKRoY1NyqMl-jXYtOtCvlHGWbhhHD4/edit
